text: Hey there! How have you been feeling lately?

day-1_1.text: Hmm, that’s exactly when the fish let their guard down.
I’ve been waiting on a fish delivery, but it hasn’t come in yet.
What kind of fish do you need?
Just anything you can find! Bring me ten fish.
Ah—but nothing too big. Something fit for a dinner table, please.
Got it. Just give me a day.

day-1_2.text: Oh, you really brought one back!
That should be enough for tonight’s dinner. Here, this is the money I promised.
I hope… it helps you out, even just a little.
...You haven’t seemed yourself lately. Are you doing okay?
...After your grandmother passed… I know I can’t fully understand how you feel.
But this ocean—it’s still here for you. It remembers you.
If you’ve got time tomorrow, could you bring me one more like today?
…I’m tired today. Let’s call it a night.
